statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan;
SELECT employee_id, plan_description FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT employee_id, plan_description FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan WHERE plan_description LIKE '%management%';
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS average_score FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan ORDER BY plan_description DESC, performance_score ASC;
SELECT employee_id, plan_description FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan WHERE performance_score > 8.0;
SELECT employee_id, training_plan_id, plan_description, performance_score FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan WHERE training_plan_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan;
SELECT training_plan_id, AVG(performance_score) AS average_score FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan GROUP BY training_plan_id HAVING AVG(performance_score) > 7.5;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance;
SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM employee_performance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT plan_description FROM training_plans WHERE plan_id = 3;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, performance_rating FROM employee_performance ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, plan_description FROM employee_performance INNER JOIN training_plans ON employee_performance.employee_id = training_plans.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_rating > 3 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM employee_performance JOIN training_plans ON employee_performance.employee_id = training_plans.employee_id WHERE training_duration > 30;

SELECT employee_name, performance_rating, plan_description FROM employee_performance JOIN training_plans ON employee_performance.employee_id = training_plans.employee_id WHERE performance_rating > 3 ORDER BY employee_name;

SELECT employee_name, plan_description, training_duration FROM training_plans JOIN employee_performance ON training_plans.employee_id = employee_performance.employee_id WHERE training_duration < 60 ORDER BY training_duration DESC;

SELECT employee_name, performance_rating, plan_description, training_duration FROM training_plans JOIN employee_performance ON training_plans.employee_id = employee_performance.employee_id WHERE performance_rating < 3 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE performance_rating >= 4 ORDER BY performance_rating ASC;
SELECT name, department, performance_rating FROM employees WHERE performance_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employees WHERE performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT plan_name, description FROM training_plans WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(description) > 50;
SELECT e.name, ep.performance_score FROM employees e JOIN employee_performance ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id WHERE ep.performance_score >= 85;
SELECT * FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_performance ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id WHERE ep.performance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee;
SELECT plan_name, target_performance_score FROM TrainingPlan;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM TrainingPlan WHERE target_performance_score > 4.5;
SELECT employee_id, performance_date, performance_score FROM EmployeePerformance ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE performance_score > 4.5;
SELECT plan_name, target_performance_score FROM TrainingPlan ORDER BY target_performance_score DESC;

SELECT employee_name, performance_score, plan_name FROM Employee INNER JOIN TrainingSession ON Employee.employee_id = TrainingSession.employee_id WHERE TrainingSession.performance_score < Employee.performance_score;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, plan_name, session_date FROM Employee INNER JOIN TrainingSession ON Employee.employee_id = TrainingSession.employee_id ORDER BY session_date;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT employee_name, department, performance_rating FROM employees ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_plans WHERE plan_name LIKE '%Management%';
SELECT employee_id, plan_id, enrollment_date FROM training_enrollment WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE performance_rating > 3 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;

SELECT employee_name, performance_score FROM employees JOIN employee_performance ON employees.employee_id = employee_performance.employee_id WHERE employee_performance.performance_score > 80 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;

SELECT employees.employee_name, training_plans.plan_name FROM employees JOIN training_enrollment ON employees.employee_id = training_enrollment.employee_id JOIN training_plans ON training_enrollment.plan_id = training_plans.plan_id WHERE training_plans.plan_name LIKE '%Development%';

SELECT employee_name, MAX(performance_score) AS highest_score FROM employees JOIN employee_performance ON employees.employee_id = employee_performance.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
